description: Unique internal identifier for the preventive maintenance category record; serves as the primary key and join reference.

Identifier from the prior system corresponding to this record; retained for migration lineage, reconciliation, and cross-referencing. Population rules and uniqueness constraints likely; confirm with SME.

Indicates whether the category is inactive/retired and should be excluded from new use and scheduling; false denotes active. Effective-dating behavior and historical reporting impact likely; confirm with SME.
